languages.text: "Нет. С тех пор я боялся брать в руки нож. Боялся, что он сам зарежет меня... Но я постоянно об этом думаю".
"No. I've been afraid to touch my own knife since that day. Thought it might just stab me on its own... But the temptation is always there."
languages.original_text: "Нет. С тех пор я боялся брать в руки нож. Боялся, что он сам зарежет меня... Но я постоянно об этом думаю".

traits.locale_text: "No. After that day, I've been afraid to touch my own knife. I thought it might stab me on its own... but the temptation is always there."
"No. After that day, I've been afraid to touch my own knife. I thought it might stab me on its own... but the temptation is always there."
"No. I've been afraid to touch my own knife since that day. Thought it might just stab me on its own... But the temptation is always there."
"No. I've been afraid to touch my own knife since that day. Thought it might just stab me on its own... But the temptation is always there."
"No. I've been afraid to touch my own knife since that day. Thought it might just stab me on its own... But the temptation is always there."
"No. I've been afraid to touch my own knife since that day. Thought it might just stab me on its own... But the temptation is always there."

languages.text: « Non. Depuis ce jour, j'ai eu peur de ne serait-ce qu'effleurer mon propre couteau. Et croyez-moi, ce n'est pas l'envie qui m'en manque. Mais je me disais qu'il trouverait peut-être le moyen de me poignarder tout seul... »
languages.original_text: "No. I've been afraid to touch my own knife since that day. Thought it might just stab me on its own... But the temptation is always there."

traits.locale_text: « Non. Depuis ce jour, j'ai eu peur de ne serait-ce qu'effleurer mon propre couteau. Et croyez-moi, ce n'est pas l'envie qui m'en manque. Mais je me disais qu'il trouverait peut-être le moyen de me poignarder tout seul... »

languages.text: «No. Desde aquel día tengo miedo de tocar mi propio cuchillo. Creía que cobraría vida y me apuñalaría... pero la tentación siempre ha estado ahí».
languages.original_text: "No. I've been afraid to touch my own knife since that day. Thought it might just stab me on its own... But the temptation is always there."

traits.locale_text: «No. Desde aquel día tengo miedo de tocar mi propio cuchillo. Creía que cobraría vida y me apuñalaría... pero la tentación siempre ha estado ahí».

languages.text: 「いえ、あの日から自分の刃に触れることが怖くなりました。勝手に動いて刺されるのではないかと…でも、誘惑は常にそこにあるのです」
languages.original_text: "No. I've been afraid to touch my own knife since that day. Thought it might just stab me on its own... But the temptation is always there."

traits.locale_text: 「いえ、あの日から自分の刃に触れることが怖くなりました。勝手に動いて刺されるのではないかと…でも、誘惑は常にそこにあるのです」

languages.text: “没有，从那天之后，我就再也没碰过我的刀。我还以为它会自己跳起来刺我呢……不过，那种诱惑却始终没有消失。”
languages.original_text: "No. I've been afraid to touch my own knife since that day. Thought it might just stab me on its own... But the temptation is always there."

traits.locale_text: “没有，从那天之后，我就再也没碰过我的刀。我还以为它会自己跳起来刺我呢……不过，那种诱惑却始终没有消失。”

languages.text: "Nein. Ich habe seit jenem Tag Angst, mein eigenes Messer zu berühren. Ich dachte, es könnte mich aus eigenem Antrieb erstechen ... Aber die Versuchung ist immer da."
languages.original_text: "No. I've been afraid to touch my own knife since that day. Thought it might just stab me on its own... But the temptation is always there."

traits.locale_text: "Nein. Ich habe seit jenem Tag Angst, mein eigenes Messer zu berühren. Ich dachte, es könnte mich aus eigenem Antrieb erstechen ... Aber die Versuchung ist immer da."

languages.text: "Hayır. O günden beri bıçağıma elimi götürmeye korkuyorum. Kendi kendine bana saplanır diyordum... Fakat cazibesi beni hâlâ çekiyor."
languages.original_text: "No. I've been afraid to touch my own knife since that day. Thought it might just stab me on its own... But the temptation is always there."
